detectCmp.exists: body > div#didomi-host > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div#didomi-notice[data-testid="notice"] > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2)#buttons > button:nth-child(2)#didomi-notice-disagree-button

detectPopup.visible: body > div#didomi-host > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div#didomi-notice[data-testid="notice"] > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2)#buttons > button:nth-child(2)#didomi-notice-disagree-button

optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div#didomi-host > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div#didomi-notice[data-testid="notice"] > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2)#buttons > button:nth-child(2)#didomi-notice-disagree-button

test.waitForVisible: body > div#didomi-host > div:not([id]) > div:not([id]) > div#didomi-notice[data-testid="notice"] > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(2)#buttons > button:nth-child(2)#didomi-notice-disagree-button
